title: Ep 514 | Phil Nails Down the Difference Between Saving the Planet and Stewarding It
description:
Zach explains the entropy and its relationship to Romans 8. All creation wants to be liberated from its bondage to decay, and Jesus made this possible for all of humanity. Phil says the ones who want to save the planet will have to settle for stewarding it, as God told us to, and that there is an indestructible Kingdom already available. And Jase warns that heaven is not heaven because of golden streets, but because of the presence of God!
